tryLater: An error has occurred! Please try again later.
sendPhoneNumber:
Please enter your phone number in the format ##*******:
For example: 991234567
tooManyRequests: Too many requests have been made. Please try to connect after ${blockLeftTime} minutes.
discountTitle: Please send brief title 📑 about the discount so users can catch something interesting on first view. 🙃
discountDescription:
Good 😊 
Now you can send detailed information 📜 about the discount. For example the products 🧩 that are sold with discount, discount percents, product prices, dates which discounts will end and so on.
discountPicture:
Good job 👌 
And now please send pictures 📸 about discount or products so customers can engage better.
discountLocation:
Well done 👍 
Last thing we need is location 🗺 where these products with
discount are sold. So customer can find you easily.
discountSaveText:
Thank you very much 👏 
We will publish your advertisement as soon as it passes checks.
